titleStmt.title: A Friendly dialogue between two London-apprentices, the one a Whigg, and the other a Tory concerning the late address to my lord mayor, to which is added a letter that was sent (by an unknown hand) to the principal managers of it.

notesStmt.note: "Concerns the petition presented Sept. 2, 1681"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
